forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 64. Southeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2am. Partly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. West wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
